Figure 5-41 PFD – BRG Source Dialog Box

Figure 5-42 PFD – BRG Source Compressed Dialog Box

The BRG SRC dialog allows the pilots to turn on or off two bearing pointers and select what navigation source drives each pointer. Bearing pointer 1 (BRG1) is driven by the left side sources (xxx1), bearing pointer 2 (BRG2) is driven by the right side sources (xxx2).
